This Is What A Dream Job Looks Like! A Website Is Offering $1000 To Binge-Watch Marvel Films
This Is What A Dream Job Looks Like! A Website Is Offering $1000 To Binge-Watch Marvel Films
Marvel fans, you have only some time left before Avengers: Infinity War releases on April 26. And if you are thinking that this is the time when you would want to commit yourself to binge watching all the films, how about also getting paid for it – $1,000/ ₹68,650 in cash?
via GIPHY
Even if you are not a Marvel fan, this offer seems a lot compelling, right? All you have to do is sit through it and watch 20 movies back-to-back. And along with the money, you will get some MCU merchandise and goodies as well – like Thanos’ Infinity Gauntlet mug, Captain America popcorn popper, Iron Man snuggie and all the films on Blu-Ray as well. So, are you up for the job?
via GIPHY
Here are the films you’ll be watching in a span of about two days.
MCU Phase 1
Iron Man (2008)
The Incredible Hulk (2008)
Iron Man 2 (2010)
Thor (2011)
Captain America: The First Avenger (2011)
The Avengers (2012)
MCU Phase 2
Iron Man 3 (2013)
Thor: The Dark World (2013)
Captain America: The Winter Soldier (2014)
Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)
Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015)
Ant-Man (2015)
MCU Phase 3
Captain America: Civil War (2016)
Doctor Strange (2016)
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (2017)
Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
Thor: Ragnarok (2017)
Black Panther (2018)
Avengers: Infinity War (2018)
Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018)
via GIPHY
Obviously, it isn’t going to be as easy as you think. You don’t only have to be a lazy bum to win this, but also an ardent Marvel fan.
They want to hire a person who has all these qualities:
#1 You’ll have to be at least 18 years-old and living in America. (Sorry, Indians)
#2 The person should be an active social media personality who’ll enthusiastically live-tweet their experience during Marvel Marathon. Also, you’ll have to tag CableTV in their tweets.
#2 You’ll also have to share your takeaway from the movies after you’ve watched them, so that Cable TV can “can make some beautiful, badass rankings together.”
Don't Miss 2.9 K SHARES 4.3 K SHARES
#3 And last, you have to be a Marvel movie enthusiast who knows every minute detail.
via GIPHY
That’s indeed a dream job, isn’t it?
